desc: "Don't Leave Home Without It" Have you ever left your house and asked yourself, "Did I lock the doors, windows, or turned off stove, oven, left my keys or cell phone? Now with 'Door-Stop-Reminder' you can be certain you have everything you need to have a successful day!!

layout.text: Never Forget to Turn Off the Stove, Lock the Doors, Shut the Windows or Leave Something Behind Again.
